```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
my_df <-
  tibble(
    x=c(0,4,7,7,19,19,16,16),
    y=c(1,1,1,2,1,2,1,2)
  )
```

```{r}
my_df |>
  note_events(props(pitch=x,duration=y,ww=y),
              base_pitch=60,
              base_time=250,
              instrument=36) |>
  play()
```
